prompt: Create a modern, minimalist 404 Not Found page with a clean white background. Display a large '404' heading in dark gray (Colors.grey[800]) using a bold font weight. Below it, show 'Page Not Found' as a subtitle in medium gray (Colors.grey[600]). Add a descriptive message 'The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.' in smaller gray text. Include a primary blue 'Go Back Home' button with rounded corners (borderRadius: 8) and white text. Center all elements vertically and horizontally using a Column layout with proper spacing (SizedBox with height: 24 between major elements). Set the main axis alignment to center and cross axis alignment to center. Use padding of 24.0 on all sides for proper spacing from screen edges.
